name: BLIP!
description:
Help Blip get back home by avoiding Blup(s)!
→ Place arrows to lead Blip on a safe path

//CONTROLS (KEYBOARD)
  • In the menu: [X] to validate, [V] to go back
  • In game:
    → Select cell: ARROW KEYS
    → Place arrow: [X] (hold) + ARROW KEYS (be aware of the Stock)
    → Remove arrow: [X]
    → Run/Stop: [V]

Don’t hesitate to use [V] to Run / Stop as many time as you want to find the safest path. Trial and error is the key to success!
